visibility.textHeadline: Product display modes per Sales Channel
visibility.visibilityModalDescription: “Hide in listing” will exclude the product from product overview listings but also from product sliders and cross selling lists. Selecting the option “Hide in listing and search” will also exclude the product from search actions. Products can still be reached via URL.
visibility.linkAdvancedVisibility: Set visibility for selected Sales Channels
visibility.bodyVisibility: Add Sales Channels in which this product should be displayed. You may further define the product visibility for each Storefront Sales Channel via the link below.
visibility.errorMessage: Unable to load default Sales Channel configuration.

general.cloneNotice: The product variants are duplicated. If this process is interrupted, it is possible that not all variants are duplicated completely. In this case you can generate the variants in the new product again.

productNumberHelpText.label: Product numbers help you identify and manage your products. To achieve this, try and keep a consistent structure in your product numbers. You can define product number templates in {link}.

highlightHelpText.label: Highlighted products are marked with a brightly coloured label and the word "Tip" in all product listings. You can adjust the label's colour by changing the option "Notice" in {themeLink} settings. You can also alter the label's text by editing the corresponding {snippetLink}.

categoryForm.placeholderSearchKeywords: Enter keywords that find this product...
categoryForm.textAddSearchKeyword: Click here to add search keyword
categoryForm.helpTextSearchKeyword: The product in the Storefront can also be found using these keywords.
categoryForm.helpTextTags: Tags are meant for internal use only. They can help you manage groups of products, apply rules or serve as custom search terms.
categoryForm.descriptionCategories: Add categories so that the product can be found via the Storefront main menu or by API connections. Make sure you select  categories that are available and active in the selected Sales Channel.
categoryForm.descriptionTags: Tags help you find products faster. They make it easier to group products and can be  utilised to automate task with the Rule Builder.

taxRateHelpText.label: Adjust the applicable VAT rate. A default VAT rate and up to two reduced rates are predefined for most countries. If you activated a tax provider the defined tax rate may be overwritten. You can check and alter the actual VAT rates or add additional rates and country assignments in {link}.

seoForm.labelCanonicalUrlMode: Use single canonical URL for all variants
seoForm.helpTextMetaTitle: The meta title is the most important SEO element and should be unique for each page. You should limit yourself in length to a maximum of 56 characters. Your keyword should ideally be placed at the very front.
seoForm.helpTextMetaDescription: With the meta description, you confirm to your customers that they are in the right place in your store. You create incentives, build trust and invite to an action. You should limit yourself to a maximum of 155 characters. Shopware allows a maximum length of 255 characters.
seoForm.helpTextKeywords: Here you can define optionally three to five keywords under which your product should be found.

settingsForm.labelActive: Active for all selected Sales Channels

packagingForm.referenceUnitHelpText:
Required to calculate the product's unit price. The base value to be entered depends on the selected scale unit.

Unit price = (product price * basic unit) / selling unit.

Unit price not displayed, if selling unit and basic unit have the same value.
packagingForm.packUnitHelpText: Type of packing: e.g. bottle, crate, tin...
packagingForm.packUnitPluralHelpText: Type of packing (plural): e.g. bottles, crates, tins...
packagingForm.purchaseUnitHelpText:
Required to calculate the product's unit price. The value to be entered depends on the selected scale unit.

Unit price = (product price * basic unit) / selling unit.

Unit price not displayed, if selling unit and basic unit have the same value.

detailBase.cardSubtitleMedia: Add files to the product's media gallery.
detailBase.cardSubtitleDownloads: Add files to your digital product.
detailBase.manageStockTooltip: If the stock is not managed, the digital product is available for an infinite amount of transactions.

modal.confirmText: Do you really want to delete this review?

reviewForm.messageEmptySubline: You can search the reviews of other products.

list.columnDownloadsTooltip: Digital products must have at least one file attached.
list.multipleVariantsDeleteModalText: Are you sure you want to delete {amount} variants?
list.notificationVariantDeleteError: There went something wrong while deleting "{variantName}". | Something went wrong while deleting multiple variants.
list.notificationVariantDeleteErrorCanonicalU: "{variantName}" could not be deleted because it is used as a canonical URL template. | Variants could not be deleted because one is used as a canonical URL template.
list.variantDeleteModalText: Are your sure you want to delete the variant "{variantName}"?
list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you really want to delete the product "{name}"? | Are you sure you really want to delete these {count} products?

detail.errorMinMaxPurchase: Could not save product, the min purchase quantity is larger than max purchase quantity.

advancedPrices.deletionNotPossibleMessage: At least one price tier needed. Try deleting the entire pricing rule instead.
advancedPrices.newRuleWarning: In order to create a new pricing rule, select a conditional rule first.
advancedPrices.advancedPricesNotExisting: No advanced prices have been set yet.
advancedPrices.advancedPricesInherited: This product has inherited prices from its parent.
advancedPrices.inheritSwitchLabel: Use advanced prices from parent product
advancedPrices.advancedPricesNotInherited: You can now use custom pricing rules for this variant.
advancedPrices.advancedPriceDisabledTooltip: The start value of the first listing price has to be 1.
advancedPrices.ruleAlreadyUsed: This rule is already used for a price rule.

properties.emptyStateNoOptionsDescription: Create properties and property values first, then return here to assign them.
properties.emptyStateNoSelectedOptionsDescription: Please select values from the search above.
properties.propertiesInherited: This product has inherited properties from its parent.
properties.propertiesNotInherited: You can now use custom properties for this variant.
properties.propertiesNotExisting: No properties assigned to this product yet.
properties.titleEmptyState: No properties assigned to this product yet.

addPropertiesModal.title: Add properties
addPropertiesModal.titleEmptyState: No properties have been created yet.
addPropertiesModal.descriptionEmptyState: Create properties and property values first, then return here to assign them.

variations.emptyStateTitle: This product has no variants yet.
variations.emptyStatePropertyTitle: No properties have been created yet
variations.emptyStatePropertyDescription: Please create properties first to be able to use them for variant generation.
variations.generatedListDeleteModalMessage: Do you really want to delete this variant?
variations.generatedListDeleteModalMessagePlural: Do you really want to delete these variants?
variations.generatedListMessageDeleteErrorCanonical: Variant could not be deleted because it is being used as the canonical url template.

configuratorModal.title: Generate variants
configuratorModal.uploadAllButton: Upload file to all digital variants
configuratorModal.uploadCardDescription: All digital variants must have at least one file in order to be saved.
configuratorModal.uploadInfoBoxHeader: Actions performed according to current configuration:
configuratorModal.selectOptionsExplanation: Select property values to generate variants from.
configuratorModal.selectRestrictionsExplanation: Select property values to exclude from variant generation.
configuratorModal.selectPricesExplanation: Add surcharges / discounts to values or currencies.
configuratorModal.surchargeNotice: Changes to the surcharges / discounts won't have an effect on already generated variants. Please go to the variant's detail page and change prices of already generated variants there.

deliveryModal.orderExplanation: Use drag & drop to alter the display sequence of property values
deliveryModal.mediaExplanation: Upload and assign alternative media to individual variants. This overrides media files that might already be assigned to the respective properties.
deliveryModal.listingExplanation: Choose between two modes of display. Either display one single product, or expand several individual variants, determined by their associated property values.
deliveryModal.listingExplanationModeSingle: Choose a variant that will be displayed in listings and preselected on the product detail page.
deliveryModal.listingExplanationModeMainProduct: Choose a variant that will be the preselected on the product detail page.
deliveryModal.listingLabelModeExpanded: Expand property values in product listings

layout.title: Layout assignment
layout.subtitle: You may change product detail pages by assigning custom layouts. If no custom layout is assigned here, the default layout will be used.
layout.textNoConfig: The currently selected layout does not have any editable elements
layout.textContentInfo: Default product blocks are filled with product data automatically. The actual contents are thus not listed here.

crossselling.buttonAddCrossSellingLanguageWarning: You can only create new cross sellings in your default language
crossselling.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the Cross Selling configuration?
crossselling.emptyStateDescription: There is no Cross Selling configured for this product, yet.
crossselling.assignEmptyStateDescription: Save the Cross Selling in order to add products to it.

featureSets.descriptionBody: Essential Characteristics help you to define what is important about your products. These characteristics are shown prominently in your customers' shopping carts and during checkout.
featureSets.configInformation: Create {0} templates first and assign them to each of your products by using the dropdown below.

imagesFilter.label: Images
imagesFilter.textHasCriteria: At least one product image assigned

filters.messageEmptySubline: Edit your filters to see results.
